histools¶

Functions and classes for processing lists of transfer functions.

Table of Classes

IonRSArray(val_arr, x_arr, rs_arr[, in_eng, eng]) Array of objects indexed by ionization and redshift.
IonRSInterp(ionrsarrays[, rs_nodes, log_interp]) Interpolation function over list of IonRSArray objects.
IonRSInterps

Classes¶

class darkhistory.history.histools.IonRSArray(val_arr, x_arr, rs_arr, in_eng=None, eng=None)¶

Bases: object

Array of objects indexed by ionization and redshift.

Parameters:
  • val_arr (ndarray) – Array of objects, indexed by (rs, …), (xH, rs, …) or (xH, xHe, rs, …)
  • x_arr (ndarray) – List of x values corresponding to val_arr, either None, 1D array or 3D array indexed by (xH, xHe), with each entry being [xH, xHe].
  • rs_arr (ndarray) – List of redshift values corresponding to val_arr.
  • in_eng (ndarray) – Injection energy abscissa of entries of val_arr.
  • eng (ndarray) – Energy abscissa of entries of val_arr.
interp_func¶

An interpolation function over ionization and redshift.

Type:function

Methods

class darkhistory.history.histools.IonRSInterp(ionrsarrays, rs_nodes=None, log_interp=False)¶

Bases: object

Interpolation function over list of IonRSArray objects.

Parameters:
  • ionrsarrays (list of IonRSArray) – IonRSArray objects to interpolate over.
  • rs_nodes (ndarray) – List of redshifts to transition between redshift regimes.
  • log_interp (bool, optional) – If true, performs an interpolation over log of the grid values.

Methods

get_val(xH, xHe, rs)
